articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from first and second practice at the Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 LIVE: Monaco Grand Prix first and second practice latest

articles.description: The latest on managers futures, with Frank, Maresca and McKenna on Chelsea's shortlist for their vacancy, plus build-up to Saturday's FA Cup final.
articles.title: Manager latest and build-up to the FA Cup final between Man Utd and Man City

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries and follow live text coverage from day one of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day one - radio & text

articles.description: Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana says it took him six months "to feel good" at Old Trafford, in the build-up to Saturday's FA Cup final.
articles.title: Andre Onana: Man United goalkeeper on difficult season & Man City FA Cup final

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on celebrity fans of Manchester City and Manchester United to predict the outcome of Saturday's FA Cup final.
articles.title: FA Cup final predictions: Chris Sutton v celebrity fans of Man City & Man Utd

articles.description: Rafael Nadal is immortalised forever in steel at Roland Garros - but this French Open is likely to be the 14-time champion's last.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal set for final Roland Garros

articles.description: A young Newcastle are thrashed 8-0 by the A-League All Stars in a post-season friendly in Melbourne.
articles.title: A-League All Stars 8-0 Newcastle: Eddie Howe's young side thumped

articles.description: Flanker Will Connors is picked ahead of Ireland open-side Josh van der Flier for Leinster's Champions Cup final against Toulouse on Saturday.
articles.title: Investec Champions Cup final: Flanker Will Connors starts against Toulouse for Leinster

articles.description: Nelly Korda's run of winning six out of seven events is bringing eyes to women's golf, which can only be good for the game, says England's Georgia Hall.
articles.title: Nelly Korda's dominance 'great' for women's golf - Georgia Hall

articles.description:
Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana says he is "very happy" with what his team-mates are doing because "a lot of them make sacrifices for the team".
United play Manchester City in the FA Cup final on Saturday.
articles.title: Andre Onana: Manchester United injuries are 'not an excuse'
